title: Jesus Sanchez Participated in a University Event

config: The Universidad Tecnológica de Torreón, invited Jesus to talk about workplace experience as part of the "1er Seminario de Investigación en Administración y Procesos" (1st Management and Processes Research Seminar). He shared his work experience as a client support specialist; he also talked about Justia as a company, what we do, its presence in México, and a bit about the company culture.
